attributes.action: Introduce a financial incentive to households who reduce their energy bills year on year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To assist in the reduction of CO2 emissions I propose that the government, in line with all energy companies, provide a financial incentive for every household in the country to reduce their energy usage from year to year.

Energy savings could be banded and a cash back value could be reimbursed by the government directly into the householders account.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions sugesting simliar schemes:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=energy
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
